rpc.design
Class ConditioningSet

java.lang.Object
  rpc.design.DesignElement
      rpc.design.ConditioningSet

public class ConditioningSet
extends DesignElement

Conditioning Set is a design element that specifices a set of path variables to condition on.

Method Detail

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
Compares this conditioning set to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the conditioning sets have the exact same set of variables to condition on.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
o - the object to compare this conditioning set against.
Returns:
true if the conditioning sets are equal; false otherwise.

getConditioningSet

public java.util.List<Path> getConditioningSet()
Get the set of conditioning path variables used.

Returns:
a list of paths corresponding to the variables to condition on.
